DOCU_Docu.DOC:
About the Package An action pack for WinRM using PowerShell.
=Supported versions=
=Setup= * WInRM must be configured and able to access the remote host. * The Agent should be able to execute the command on the remote host using PowerShell.
=Common Inputs= (None)
=Actions= Following actions are supported.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_WINRM.PUB.ACTION.RUN_COMMANDS * Action Description: This action runs provided commands on remote server.
